name: Node-RED
description: A visual tool for wiring the Internet of Things.

NODE_RED_PASSWORD.description: The password to secure the editor.

NODE_RED_USERNAME.description: The username to secure the editor.

NODE_RED_BASE_URL.description: Base url to this application e.g.  https://hostname.tld:5000

NODE_RED_AUTH_ADMIN_COGNITO.description: Whether or not to use OAuth from Cognito for logging into the editor.

NODE_RED_AUTH_ADMIN_COGNITO_GROUP.description: The Cognito group that is granted access to the editor.

NODE_RED_COGNITO_LABEL.description: The phrase to use to indicate the login action. For example: Login with Cognito.

NODE_RED_COGNITO_REGION.description: Which AWS region to connect to Cognito in.

NODE_RED_COGNITO_CALLBACK.description: The full callback URL to relay users to after authenticating.

NODE_RED_COGNITO_CLIENT_DOMAIN.description: Which Cognito user pool URL to use for user authentication.

NODE_RED_COGNITO_CLIENT_ID.description: The application/client ID to use to identify this app to Cognito.

NODE_RED_COGNITO_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The application/client secret to use with Cognito when generating user tokens.
